physics.motor: No motors. Completely open to environmental energy
physics.energy_mechanics: Designed to sample and reflect the health of community. No consistent identity - becomes the environment.

strategy.name: Wait a Lunar Cycle
strategy.description: For major decisions, wait 28-29 days (full lunar cycle) to gain clarity
strategy.mechanics: Reflectors are so open they need time to sample all perspectives. The Moon's cycle through all 64 gates gives Reflectors access to complete perspective.
examples: Job offer received? Wait full moon cycle before accepting
Moving cities? Experience all moon phases in both locations

signature.name: Surprise
signature.description: When living correctly, Reflectors experience constant surprise and delight at life's unfolding

not_self_theme.name: Disappointment
not_self_theme.description: When not following Strategy, Reflectors become disappointed

failure_states.diagnosis: Making decisions too quickly, not honoring lunar cycle
failure_states.correction: Wait 28 days for major decisions. Journal daily through moon cycle.
failure_states.experiment: Next big decision: wait full lunar cycle. Journal daily. Notice clarity emergence.

failure_states.diagnosis: Trying to have consistent personality, resisting fluidity
failure_states.correction: Accept that you're different every day based on environment. This is wisdom, not instability.
failure_states.experiment: Track how you feel in different environments for 28 days. Notice patterns.

failure_states.diagnosis: Being in wrong environment, absorbing unhealthy energy
failure_states.correction: Ruthlessly curate environment. Leave toxic spaces immediately.
failure_states.experiment: Assess all environments (home, work, relationships). Remove/change what feels consistently wrong.

with_generator.dynamics: Reflector mirrors Generator's energy back. Can show Generator their blind spots.
with_generator.friction_points: Generator's intensity overwhelming Reflector. Reflector's need for time frustrating Generator.
with_generator.harmony_keys: Generator: give Reflector space and time. Reflector: appreciate Generator's consistency.

with_manifestor.dynamics: Reflector mirrors Manifestor's impact. Shows Manifestor their effect on others.
with_manifestor.friction_points: Manifestor's force overwhelming Reflector. Reflector's fluidity confusing to Manifestor.
with_manifestor.harmony_keys: Manifestor: soften around Reflector. Reflector: help Manifestor see their impact.

with_projector.dynamics: Two highly sensitive types. Beautiful mutual witnessing possible.
with_projector.friction_points: No sustainable energy together. Both need others' recognition/space.
with_projector.harmony_keys: Recognize each other's sensitivity. Don't expect energy from each other.

with_reflector.dynamics: Rare. Two mirrors. Complete environment sampling together.
with_reflector.friction_points: No consistent energy or identity. Can feel like nothing solid.
with_reflector.harmony_keys: Appreciate shared fluid nature. Create stability through ritual, not identity.

with_manifesting_generator.dynamics: Reflector samples MG's multi-tasking energy. MG benefits from Reflector's environmental wisdom.
with_manifesting_generator.friction_points: MG's speed overwhelming. Reflector's need for time frustrating to MG.
with_manifesting_generator.harmony_keys: MG: slow down for Reflector. Reflector: appreciate MG's energy without trying to match it.

career_alignment.ideal_work: Roles that sample community health: evaluator, assessor, community barometer, researcher
signs_of_right_work: Feel surprised and delighted by work
Flexibility to change with moon cycle
signs_of_wrong_work: No flexibility for your fluid nature

rest_requirements.sleep: Reflectors need to completely discharge absorbed energy before sleep. Alone time essential. 8-9 hours minimum.
rest_requirements.work_rhythm: Completely dependent on moon cycle and environment. Some days high energy, some days need deep rest.
rest_requirements.restoration: Must have alone time to release absorbed energy. Discriminate environments ruthlessly.

communication_style.speaking: Reflects back what they've absorbed. Often surprising and insightful observations.
communication_style.listening: Absorbs everything. Natural samplers of emotional and energetic fields.
communication_style.decision_making: Requires lunar cycle for major choices. Talk through with trusted council.

conflict_resolution.pattern: Reflector disappointment when not honoring need for time and right environment
conflict_resolution.healthy_approach: Express disappointment. Leave wrong environments. Wait for clarity.
conflict_resolution.unhealthy_pattern: Stay in toxic environments, make quick decisions, accumulate disappointment

core_wound.description: Being rushed to decide, told they're unstable, not given time to sample
core_wound.conditioning: Society demands consistency. Shames Reflector's fluid nature as weakness.
core_wound.healing: Recognize that fluidity is wisdom. You're designed to be different each day. This is your power.

healing_modality.primary: Right environment, lunar cycle honoring, alone time
practices: Honor 28 day process for major decisions

spiritual_pathway.essence: Surprise through lunar wisdom. Reflectors are here to reflect community health.
spiritual_pathway.transcendence: When Reflector honors lunar cycle and right environment, they become pure mirror. No fixed self, just clear reflection.
